about_the_game:
Welcome to Dino Ramen Express! 

In this game, you’ll experience a series of story missions in a sandbox open world to grow your Ramen business!

Currently in the Alpha testing phase for its Steam Next Fest version.

Start from scratch and build your business empire!

Collect various items and resources for your business operation. Deliver Ramen and navigate challenges to connect with unique souls along the way.

While the game's main stage is Ark Park, the campaign features Delivery missions to different worlds, eras, and universes! Travel across bizarre, mysterious, and dangerous dimensions to deliver your Ramen fresh and hot to your customers!!

Embark on your adventure through Ark Park and achieve your dream of building a business empire with your team!

From Ramen to Rifles, a quirky, over-the-top shooting experience?!

Experience the flashy gunplay. Yea, gunplay in a Ramen Delivery game.

You can collect, purchase, and upgrade your weapons to shred your enemies!

Use the weapons you cherish the most to protect your important deliveries. This will make a name for you and your shooting buddy across Ark Park and other worlds!

Terrifying foes? Dependable allies!

In the game, you’ll encounter foes from outside of Ark Park (some of which will seem oddly familiar). Operating the little ramen shop requires both courage and responsibility. Whether you're guns-blazing against business competitors or unknown dangers while delivering packages, we believe you'll rise to the challenge in style!

Plenty of multiplayer maps and modes to satisfy your competitive or cooperative itch!

Apart from the story campaign, you can explore various multiplayer modes designed to highlight all the gameplay features! Modes like Zombies, Boss Rush, Control, Deathmatch, and others in the making bring the ultimate joy of competing and cooperating with other players and friends worldwide.

Hop in this bizarre yet romantic world, and experience the story of two best friends’ entrepreneur journey!

Have a great time in Dino Ramen Express!

Welcome to Dino Ramen Express! 

In this game, you’ll experience a series of story missions in a sandbox open world to grow your Ramen business!

Currently in the Alpha testing phase for its Steam Next Fest version.

Start from scratch and build your business empire!

Collect various items and resources for your business operation. Deliver Ramen and navigate challenges to connect with unique souls along the way.

While the game's main stage is Ark Park, the campaign features Delivery missions to different worlds, eras, and universes! Travel across bizarre, mysterious, and dangerous dimensions to deliver your Ramen fresh and hot to your customers!!

Embark on your adventure through Ark Park and achieve your dream of building a business empire with your team!

You can collect, purchase, and upgrade your weapons to shred your enemies!

Whether you're guns-blazing against business competitors or unknown dangers while delivering packages, we believe you'll rise to the challenge in style!

Hop in this bizarre yet romantic world, and experience the story of two best friends’ entrepreneur journey!

name: Dino Ramen Express

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 or AMD A8-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 VRAM 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11 supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 or AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 4070 VRAM 16GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11 supported

short_description: From RAMEN to RIFLES! This is an immersive first-person simulation game where players can run their own restaurant empire. The game allows players to devise their own business strategies, from hands-on "guns & blazing" food delivery in the open world to staff management at stores.
